summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation authorizing the execution of agreements with the Housing Authority of The City of Seattle for the purchase, operation and maintenance of a condominium unit in the former Ravenna Elementary School for use as part of the Eckstein Community Center; authorizing reimbursement of the Housing Authority for monies spent in preconstruction preparation; authorizing the expenditure of funds previously appropriated by Ordinance 111981 for payment of the purchase price and for reimbursement of the Housing Authority; and authorizing acceptance of the deed upon delivery.
